ygData.subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !
ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaster grabs thin air as he looks up to see Dark fly upwards, rotten punk, stand still he shouts, he then looks forwards and see the missile head

Date: Mon, 5 Feb 2001 07:35:52 -0700
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster grabs thin air as he looks up to see Dark fly upwards, "rotten
punk, stand still" he shouts, he then looks forwards and see the missile
head towards him, he braces for the impact of the missile, but it too turns
upward, as he starts to smirk a fireball hits him in the back, smoke
erupting from the wound, and causes him to hurtle into Killfest.
